days.text: Mainly cloudy. Light rain at first. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Temperature falling. Mainly cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, becoming force 5 to 6 northerly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling slightly. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 4 to 6 northerly winds with gusts.
